titleStmt.title: The first examinacyon of Anne Askewe lately martyred in Smythfelde, by the Romysh popes vpholders, with the elucydacyon of Iohan Bale.
titleStmt.author: Askew, Anne, 1521-1546.
Bale, John, 1495-1563.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by D. van der Straten],
publicationStmt.pubPlace: [Imprented at Marpurg in the lande of Hessen [i.e. Wesel :

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; actual publication information from STC.
Leaf 1v (first series) has printer's mark of Johann and Gottfried van Kempen of Cologne.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
